amendment.description: An amendment numbered 13 printed in House Report 116-61 to require Navigators to receive training on how to assist consumers with Medicaid and CHIP enrollment.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Johnson (TX) amendment (A013) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A013) offered by Ms. Johnson (TX).
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Johnson (TX) amendment (A013) Agreed to by voice vote.
